txt.en: TBD Grazadh-gropor has long stood as a home to Wood-trolls.   These foul creatures hold a vital location for foraging supplies and hunting small game.   You should dispatch these creatures so that the free folk can once again return to this area.

Grazadh-gropor has long been home to foul wood-trolls. Free folk seek to forage beneath its dark canopy for roots and other necessities of life. Defeating the wood-trolls throughout the area would be a boon to those living nearby.

Who would live in Grazadh-gropor?\n\nWood-trolls. The answer, it seems, is wood-trolls. No one else would wish to live in such a place, though some free folk do seek to forage beneath its dark canopy for roots and other necessities of life.
Free folk have long sought rare roots and other necessities of life amongst the foliage of Grazadh-gropor.  Wood-trolls jealously protect this place from all whom approach it.
Grazadh-gropor will never be entirely safe, but your defeat of the wood-trolls will allow the free folk to forage beneath its canopy for much-needed provisions, for a time.
Defeating wood-trolls throughout Grazadh-gropor would bring help to free folk who need the roots and herbs throughout the area to survive.
TBD Your actions in Grazadh-gropor have allowed the free-peoples to gather much needed supplies throughout the area.
